blog.name: lovelytonys
blog.title: tony stark & mcu
blog.description: A gal who is very passionate about a red-and-gold-armor-wearing hero. Call me Kay (or K, whichever).

summary: I love the idea of Tony having a soft spot for musicals because of his mother. I’ve seen this idea thrown around every now and...
body:
I love the idea of Tony having a soft spot for musicals because of his mother. I’ve seen this idea thrown around every now and again, especially with the memory of Maria playing a song from The Fantasticks as shown in Civil War, and I love it.

In my head, classic musicals were, like, their Thing. Also in my head, Tony knows how to play the piano, and I imagine that Maria liked to teach him to play her favorite songs from musicals. She loved musicals, so she loved to show them to little Tony on a rare night at home. When Tony was feeling down because of Howard and Maria didn’t know how to make it up to him with words, she would watch and old Hollywood musical with him and hope it brightened things at least a little bit.

It’s not something that stuck with Tony in a big way. It’s not like he’s actively a fan of musicals. But sometimes, on the days that are harder than others and he wishes he had someone to go to, someone like his mom, he finds himself humming some tune from his childhood, and even all these decades later, it’s still comforting. Almost like his mother resting a hand on his shoulder, from wherever she was.

I love the idea of Tony having a soft spot for musicals because of his mother. I’ve seen this idea thrown around every now and again, especially with the memory of Maria playing a song from The Fantasticks as shown in Civil War, and I love it.

In my head, classic musicals were, like, their Thing. Also in my head, Tony knows how to play the piano, and I imagine that Maria liked to teach him to play her favorite songs from musicals. She loved musicals, so she loved to show them to little Tony on a rare night at home. When Tony was feeling down because of Howard and Maria didn’t know how to make it up to him with words, she would watch and old Hollywood musical with him and hope it brightened things at least a little bit.

It’s not something that stuck with Tony in a big way. It’s not like he’s actively a fan of musicals. But sometimes, on the days that are harder than others and he wishes he had someone to go to, someone like his mom, he finds himself humming some tune from his childhood, and even all these decades later, it’s still comforting. Almost like his mother resting a hand on his shoulder, from wherever she was.

summary: Tony has built a VR experience platform in which a user can do anything and be anything and have adventures in different reality...
caption:
Tony has built a VR experience platform in which a user can do anything and be anything and have adventures in different reality zones. Tony’s activity of choice – literally like. Roleplaying Stephen Strange. 

Tony.

I mean, you have to put some effort into hiding your crush, this is so embarrassing.

Source-Coder Supreme. My god.

Tony Stark: Iron Man (2018), Issue #3

blog.name: playbucky
blog.title: Play Bucky
blog.description: Nessie | 20 | Scottish | REQUESTS ARE OPEN!!!

title: Transformation - 2
body:
Since saving the world, your body is healing its self. The Avengers have never saw it before and it’s scaring them, and you, but you can’t let them see it.
Characters – Avengers x Reader
Word Count – 1226

Part 1/ Part 2

You let out a scream which lowered to a whimper as the pain spread.
‘It’s moving fast.’ You heard as the pain exploded further down you abdomen. They looked at you lying on the table, as your veins turned a deep blue, almost black in colour, spreading across your chest and stomach. You let out another scream as you felt it move across the rest of your stomach and down to your left thigh.
‘Y/N – with-.’ You heard, you opened your eyes but shut them as the bright light hit them.

-

‘Y/N?’ You heard, you finally opened your eyes to see everyone watching you. You moved away from a hand coming towards you.
‘Move please just-‘ You managed to say before arching your back as the pain ran down the centre of your back.
‘What’s happening?’ Shuri questioned as she stood at the side of the bed, you had been moved into.
‘I’ve used to much power – cells are fighting each other.’ You panted out.
‘What can we do?’ Steve asked, you shook your head as they watched you go through another wave of pain.
‘Nothing, meds don’t help it.’ You said, you looked around the room, everyone’s watching you closely.
‘Does it take long?’ Shuri questioned.
‘Depends how much I transformed myself.’ You told them, your fists clenching then unclenching at your side. Vision watched you, knowing that you were going through this because of him.
‘I’m sorry.’ Vision spoke up, you looked at him and smiled.
‘it’s not your fault.’ You told him.
‘I asked you to do it.’ He said.
‘And I could have said no.’ You told him.
‘I don’t want to seem rude but can y’all leave me?’ You asked them.
‘I don’t want you to see this.’ You told them as you motioned to yourself, finally looking at your hand. Your veins spreading black across them. They nodded before leaving the room one at a time. Once everyone was out, you got out the bed before grabbing a pillow and sliding down the wall. Bringing the pillow up to your mouth you let out a long, muffled scream. They stood the opposite side of the door, fighting the urge to walk back in.

-

It had been three days and you had still to emerge from the room. Everyone had been taken turns to watch and to catch the others up, who had returned, on what had happened. Tony and Peter walked into the medical wing to be checked out when they heard your scream. They took off down to be met with a tired looking Wanda.
‘Who’s in there?’ Tony asked, she flinched as your sobs echoed.
‘Y/N.’ She replied and Tony and Peter started to panic.
‘Is she okay?’ Peter questioned, he had looked up to you since Tony had introduced him to you.
‘She’s fine.’ She said as she rested her head against the wall, letting out a sigh.
‘Then why is she screaming?’ Tony quizzed.
‘She transformed fully into vision and they defeated Thanos.’ Wanda informed them.
‘Now her cells are fighting each other, have been for three days, to get back to normal.’ Wanda explained.
‘Why aren’t you in there with her?’ Tony asked.
‘She doesn’t want anyone in with her.’ Wanda told them.
‘How long will it take?’ Peter questioned, worry etched on his face. Wanda shrugged her shoulders.
‘We don’t know. No ones seen this before and because she became a full replica of Vision, down to his circuits, it could be a while.’ Wanda told them.
‘Can we see her?’ Peter asked, Wanda went silent before you screamed ‘no’. Tony looked at Wanda’s tired figure before walking past her and opening the door, the light from the hall entering the room. 
‘I said no.’ you said from the corner Tony squinted his eyes as he watched you figure turn to look at him.
‘Tony.’ You said happily, glad that he made it back, you moved forward before stopping when the light hit you, you heard a asp.
‘What’s happening to you?’ He asked stepping forward as he took in your fragile appearance, with the black veins covering your skin as if you had been poisoned, your skin had also paled and pulled taunt over your bones as bruises formed and the cast you  had received on your arm when it broke.
‘Don’t let him see me li-‘ You said trying to move back but Peter walked in.
‘Y/N?’ He questioned, you looked to the door and saw him, looking at you with wide eyes.
‘Go away.’ You told him, stepping back and away from them.
‘What’s happening?’ He questioned, and you tried not to snap at him.
‘Cells are reproducing.’ Was all you said before moving back completely into the darkness.
‘When you leave, shut the door.’ You told them as you sat on the chair tucking your legs underneath you. Tony and Peter watched you for a couple of seconds before turning around and leaving the room, shutting the door behind them.

-

When you opened the door, no one was there, so you wondered the through the halls until you heard their voices. Following it to a room you heard a fed-up Steve arguing with someone and Tony backing him up. When you stood in the doorway, you noticed members of the government standing as the others sat around the table. Vision looked up first before standing up, everyone looked at him before following his stare.
‘You look unwell.’ The commissioner commented as he took in your appearance.
‘saving the world does that to you.’ You said as you walked around and took a seat next to Vision and beside Tony. Everyone watching you.
‘We’ll continued this later.’ The commissioner commented.
‘No, don’t worry about me, continue.’ You said, he glanced at you before continuing. You zoned out and continued clenching your left fist that was still sore and slightly covered in the black veins.

-

Once the meeting was over everyone turned to you.
‘Are you better?’ Natasha asked, you nodded as you stood up and down a twirl, before sitting back down.
‘All good.’ You said, she smiled and nodded.
‘What happened? We’d never saw it before.’ Shuri questioned as she sat next to Bruce.
‘My cells were fighting each other, they do it every time I change, but because I changed myself completely my body didn’t know what to do and what was the correct version.’ You explained to the group.
‘has it happened before?’ Bruce questioned.
‘This big. Only once.’ You told them.
‘What does it feel like?’ Peter questioned as he watched your wearily, you felt guilty he had to see you like that.
‘At times, pins and needles, but usually like getting stabbed. The further the progress goes the more painful it gets.’ You explained.
‘The organs start to regenerating and once the new ones are ready, they peel like a snake.’ You continued explaining.
‘My bones break-‘ You motioned to you cast.
‘And mend.’ You finished explaining to them.
‘Your veins went black.’ Peter pointed out.
‘Yeah, that’s the cells changing in my blood.’ You told him, and he nodded.
‘So you’re all good now?’ Vision questioned, you nodded.
‘Still sore, but it’s all done now.’ You told him.
‘I just need this cast off, it’s becoming unbearably itchy.’ You said as you looked at Shuri.

Tags - @dudahmautner @anunknownnebula @maygenjayne1 @captain-shannon-becker @coffeebooksandfandoms @chas-z @ihaeresortedtonothingness @nikolanna @screamingfetus @they-call-me-le @firedolphin04 @controloffandoms @therealmrshale @princess76179 @be-amaziing @supermoonpanda @lyrasliverroseelizabethamanti @lilmissperfectlyimperfect @finnofamerica @m00sethemurderer

blog.name: fyeahmarvel
blog.title: fyeahmarvel
blog.description:
Welcome to FYEAHMARVEL, your source for everything Marvel related! We aim to provide you with the latest gifs,
 edits, news, and more on the Marvel Universe.We track #marveledit but if you have something you want us to see just tag it with #fyeahmarvel and we'll take a look!

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: What'll you fall for?
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2wbvfOR

by Minkey222

Jesus Christ, what happened?

“What?” he’d answered, no hello, no nothing. Just ‘what’ (God he’s so awful). He heard Happy sigh down the end of the phone.

“It’s Peter,” and didn’t that just send a shiver down his spine. The voice was sorrowful, exasperated and worried. And now everything seemed to be wrong.

Words: 1236, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 7 of Peter Parker is young, dumb and reckless (and also in constant pain)

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Peter Parker

by Minkey222

Jesus Christ, what happened?

“What?” he’d answered, no hello, no nothing. Just ‘what’ (God he’s so awful). He heard Happy sigh down the end of the phone.

“It’s Peter,” and didn’t that just send a shiver down his spine. The voice was sorrowful, exasperated and worried. And now everything seemed to be wrong.

summary: I just saw someone on this trash site compare Tony Stark to Donald Tump and wow the Tony-antis have really lost it now. Tony...
body: I just saw someone on this trash site compare Tony Stark to Donald Tump and wow the Tony-antis have really lost it now. Tony isn’t a racist, sexist, homophobic idiot and if they think that, they are delusional. They’re just salty that he got more screen time than St*ve R*gers in Infinity War

blog.name: feelingsinwinter
blog.title: Feelings In Winter
blog.description:
• Gramunion has no right to display my art, fanfic, likeness or work and is infringing on my rights.

Buy me a coffee

She/Her or whatever you want, really, I don’t mind and I don’t care. I’m a french of 20 something years old (it’s not that I’m suspicious enough to not give my real age, it’s more because I’m lazy with a bad memory).

I ship quite a lot but mostly and primly: Winteriron, I like Stark Lord and Ironwidow too, quite there for Stuckony and Winterironwidow. I’m not into Stony or Stucky, I don’t really like it but you might find a bit of this in my blog because I’m no hater.

I reblog a lot of fictions I find in the fandom I like (Marvel but you might find Star Trek too and at some point some Star Wars, you can find it all in the section “fanfiction I reblogged”). I also reblog fanart (search for “fanart” and you’ll find them all) and every kind of fanmade stuff.

I also post some personal stuff. You might find a few pictures of my cats (if you want to see them, try “snow’s cats” and you should see them) because I’m a real cat person but you also might find my dog. I write a bit and you’ll find it in the “my writing” section. I crochet which means I’m doing marvel stuff or cats, or some other stuff. You’ll find it in the “my crochet projects” section, have fun telling me what you think of my yarn garbage. And sometimes because I’m a child, I do pictures of my lego or put them in situation (sometimes from a fanfiction I like or I do a fiction to go with the picture) There’s a few of them and you’ll find them in the “my lego shit” section.

I didn’t say it but I’m a huge fan and protector of Iron Man and you can fight me over Tony Stark whenever you want but, beware, I bite. I love Bucky Barnes too and for this one I might use the knives. You can come to me any time in my ask box, I’m quite nice (I think) and I will certainly answer you. If you prefer that I answer you privately, don’t hesitate to say it and I will.

Crédits : The Header’s from @Beir. The icon of my account is from the amazing, wonderful @Massivespacewren! Such a wonderful gift for my birthday! They are amazing artists and do wonderful things! Check them out, you won't regret it!

Fɪɴᴅ ᴍᴇ ᴏɴ AO3

summary: One day, Steve goes to the place Tony has designed for him so Steve could draw, paint and art his way through life, and finds...
body:
One day, Steve goes to the place Tony has designed for him so Steve could draw, paint and art his way through life, and finds Tony. Steve’s shield is on the table beside Tony and there’s paint spread and smeared all over it. In front of the genius stood a colorful canvas. Clearly Tony’s making.

Tony, covered in paint and holding a brush : “Sorry, couldn’t find the palette.”

Steve: Tony… you don’t paint.

Tony, grinning and sticking his brush in bright pink paint: Oh, I don’t?

Steve: Is it payback for using a tablet as a wedge?

Tony, keeping eyecontact as he gently brushed bright pink over the canvas: Definitely is.
